text: midneun salamdeul-iyeo salam-i da leun salam-eul biusji anhdolog hala hu jaga jeonjaboda hullyunghal sudo issno la yeoseong-i daleun yeoseong-eul biusji anh dolog hala hujaga jeonjaboda hullyung hal sudo issnola seologa seolo-ege jungsanghaneun geosgwa jeosoghan byeonmyeongdo a ni doenila mid-eum-eul gajin huui jeosog han ileum-eun saaghan geos-imyeo hoegaeha ji ani han ja sillo joein-ila
